alert.note: Alert for Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 3:19PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Malheur County through 400 PM PDT... At 316 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brushy Hollow to near Jackson Summit. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Westfall, Harper, Juntura and Brushy Hollow around 420 PM MDT. Vale, Sugarloaf Butte and Bully Creek Reservoir around 430 PM MDT. Brogan, Brogan Hill Summit, Jamieson and Brosman Mountain around 500 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
